Name: Twilight City: Love as a Cure
About the game: In Twilight City: Love as a Cure, you're a young vampire passionately in love with a human. However, the curse of being immortal comes at a high price. Your burning desire for blood can destroy your love. It's up to you to search for a cure in the mysterious city of Skylight. Overcome all obstacles and become human again! Unique gameplay Immersive atmosphere Remove the vampire curse!
